Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura scored his first NBA field goal, a three-pointer
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yuki Kawamura's first bucket received hundreds of thousands of views on the NBA's official account on X
Others: Yuki Kawamura finished with three points, one assist, and two rebounds in close to five minutes of action
Akatsuki Japan teammate Rui Hachimura had nine points and four rebounds for the Lakers in a separate game
